message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a competitive price considering its worth $1000000 to you. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $850000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000.
